text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-QualityMeasureSectionType
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org

name: DocumentSectionType
title: DocumentSectionType
description: The type of document section. Possible values: review of systems, medical history, family history, microscopic findings, etc.
